title: Defeat tuberculosis
creator_credit: H.M. Nieter, Paul Rotha and Seven-League Productions
brief_description: This film gives an outline of the precautions which everyone should take to prevent and avoid tuberculosis, and goes on to deal briefly with modern methods of treating tuberculosis patients.
